title: Improve UX regarding Default Inheritance
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
**Context:**
The user would like to set default inheritance settings so that new connections always inherit the username, password, and domain from it's parent.

**User Journey:**
1. Left click the **Connections** tree node
1. Click the **Default Inheritance** button at the top of the config window.
1. Set the appropriate inheritance values to `Yes`

**User Journey in pictures:**
![2016-11-10_0907](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6999446/20184256/497d0548-a725-11e6-9747-70073...

iterations.description: Users cannot set default inheritance for username/password/domain fields, and the overall inheritance UX needs improvement as a legitimate enhancement request
